column3: Caur needs the help of a strong <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If>.
Obtain a tent pillar from the ruined tent.
Deliver the tent pillar to Caur.
Could I ask you to help with repairing our tent?
The central pillar propping it up has been steadily weakening over the recent months and I worry it will not hold out much longer.
However, the other day I noticed that there is a perfectly good pillar just south of here. You will find it amongst the remains of a Kahkol tent destroyed by the Buduga.
There is another pillar just south of here. You will find it amongst the remains of a Kahkol tent destroyed by the Buduga.
Were you able to find the pillar?
Oh, thank you! This should hold for many a year yet.
We never lack for wool to make tent covers, but finding solid tree trunks to serve as pillars is not quite as straightforward.
You have truly done us a great service. Thank you.
